text: Stanisław Motyka (6 May 1906 - 7 July 1941) was a Polish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1928 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Polish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Poland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1928 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane
title: Stanisław Motyka
